name: Trash Goblin
storyline: In this (very) cosy Shop Sim you play as an orphaned Goblin unearthing, cleaning and upcycling rare and valuable trinkets to sell to a bewildering variety of customers from all walks of life - all to save up enough money to realise your dreams of becoming an adventuring archaeologist!
summary: A cosy and moreish fantasy shop sim where you uncover, clean, upcycle and sell a vast variety of trinkets - both invaluable and unlovable - to a diverse cast of fascinating customers across a colourful fantasy city. Think Potionomics meets PowerWash Simulator, with a unique protagonist!
